lead_paragraph: The Kenyan star and former world record holder Paul Tergat has set his eyes on the New York City Marathon in November. Tergat, 39, whose world mark of 2:04.55 in Berlin in 2003 was bettered by his Ethiopian archrival Haile Gebreselassie last year, has not competed since finishing sixth in the 2007 London marathon.
